entries.s_f1baf7f: Elections, Sand People raids, museums! So many new things are happening in Bestine. Listen to the townsfolk. They may have interesting things to say.
entries.s_c17cd032: I'm waiting for someone else. I've heard, however, that Sean Trenwell is in need of assistance at the capitol.
entries.s_3e134731: It's finished. Go tell him the good news. He and his career are safe.
entries.s_1e325cde: So he's got himself into more trouble I see. I just heard the news. Let me have that disk. He'll be grateful to you.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (sean_contact.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
